scripts.browserify: browserify lib/index.js --debug -t yamlify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ transform-inline-environment-variables ] ] | exorcist index.js.map > index.js && npm run normalize-map
scripts.less: lessc index.less | postcss --use postcss-assets --use postcss-font-magician --postcss-font-magician.protocol=https: ---use postcss-flexbugs-fixes --use autoprefixer > index.css
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run browserify" "npm run pug" "npm run less"
scripts.browserify:production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify lib/index.js --debug -t yamlify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ transform-inline-environment-variables ] ] -t uglifyify | exorcist index.min.js.map > index.min.js && npm run normalize-map:production
scripts.less:production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production lessc index.less | postcss --use postcss-assets --use postcss-font-magician --postcss-font-magician.protocol=https: --use postcss-flexbugs-fixes --use autoprefixer --use cssnano > index.min.css
scripts.build:production: concurrently "npm run browserify:production" "npm run pug:production" "npm run less:production"
scripts.watch:js: watchify lib/index.js --debug --verbose -t yamlify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ transform-inline-environment-variables ] ] -o "exorcist index.js.map > index.js"
scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:map" "npm run watch:pug" "npm run watch:less"
scripts.mochify:phantom: cross-env MOCHIFY=true mochify "test/unit/*.ls" --reporter spec --extension ls --extension js --transform yamlify --transform browserify-livescript --transform [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.mochify:node: cross-env MOCHIFY=true mochify "test/unit/*.ls" --node --reporter spec --extension ls --extension js --transform yamlify --transform browserify-livescript --transform [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] --plugin [ mochify-istanbul --exclude "**/+(test|node_modules)/**/*" --report text --report text-summary --report lcovonly --dir coverage ]
scripts.unit: npm run mochify:node && npm run mochify:phantom
scripts.test: npm run unit && npm run functional && npm run lint
scripts.test:api:init: cd api && cross-env NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && cross-env NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate && cross-env NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:seed:all
